alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 29 at 4:10PM MDT until May 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall in thunderstorms is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Idaho and southwest Idaho, including the following areas, in south central Idaho, Southern Twin Falls County. In southwest Idaho, Southwest Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff from brief heavy rain in thunderstorms may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow storm movement, training thunderstorms, and the potential for rain rates of over an inch per hour pose the threat of localized flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
